title: SonicScrubber Household Cleaning Brush - Electric Scrubbing Brush - Home, Kitchen & Bathroom - Removes Mould & Cleans Grout (Washing-Up System)
features: THE ORIGINAL Many try to bear the name, but there is only one SonicScrubber. We started the range and lead it with the best technology and attachments. The Household Pack expertly cleans all areas of the home, including tiles, showers, baths, sinks, carpets and upholstery.

CLEANS INBETWEENS No nook or cranny is safe from SonicScrubber, our precision tool reaches all crevices in your home. Clean all corners of your home, effortlessly! Use hand-in-hand with your everyday cleaning products.

ADJUSTABLE This SonicScrubber tool is equipped with 1 Large, 1 Soft, 1 Cone, and 1 All-Purpose brush head. Switching the brush head is easy by locating the arrows where the brush head meets the tool/handle. Twisting the head in the direction of the arrows shown and pulling away from the tool (reverse to attach).
POWERFUL: High-power motor with 10K oscillations per minute. Watertight, lightweight (212g) and dishwasher safe. Slide button up/down for continious on/off, or press to use. 4 x AA batteries included

SHOP THE RANGE Ensure your dishes and bottles are sparkling clean with our NEW SonicScrubber Washing-Up System. SonicScrubber Automotive is the perfect cleaning companion for your Car or Van, can be use on interior and exterior and leaves surfaces sparkling clean. SonicScrubber Boot Brush refreshes your trainers and boots to remove mud, dirt and stains.​

Previous page Next page 1 Speed 2 Power 3 Watertight How do I change the heads on my Household Cleaning System? To remove and lock a new brush head, look at where the head meets the tool/handle and locate the text 'Twist to remove'. Twist the head in the direction of the arrows shown and then pull away from the tool. How does SonicScrubber compare to similar products on the market? When compared with manual methods, the SonicScrubber is a great addition or replacement of manual brushes. We are the only ones to provide you with the original version, that is durable, and which lasts the volume and vigour of cleaning regimes.
